name: Audi A4
description: The price of Audi A4, a 5 seater Sedan, ranges from Rs. 45.34  - 53.50 Lakh. It is available in 3 variants, with an engine of 1984 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. A4 has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 8 airbags. Audi A4 is available in 5 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 17.4 kmpl for A4.

variants.variant_name: A4 Premium 40 TFSI 1984 cc, Petrol, Automatic (DCT), 17.4 kmpl, 202 bhp
A4 Premium Plus 40 TFSI 1984 cc, Petrol, Automatic (DCT), 17.4 kmpl, 202 bhp
A4 Technology 40 TFSI 1984 cc, Petrol, Automatic (DCT), 17.4 kmpl, 202 bhp
